localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: OneSimpleApi was born out of the idea that there should be a simple way of achieving complex features, when working with no-code tools. A toolbox, where you can find all the APIs that will make your creation go the extra mile: Just... One Simple API.
nodes.title: OneSimpleApi.com - The first API toolkit for no-coders
nodes.author: Pablius

nodes.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
nodes.title: SVG Color Matrix Mixer - Generate nice looking color matrix filters for your images
nodes.author: Rik Schennink

nodes.excerpt: Huge re-design on Failory + 2 new projects: - Amazon Cemetery: Analyses of why +50 Amazon projects failed - Tools: Collection of +80 tools for startup founders.
nodes.title: Failory 3.0 - All-in-one content site for startup founders
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
nodes.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning
nodes.author: Sungho Yahng

nodes.excerpt: The joyful card platform âœ¨ Teamo has everything you need to create delightful group cards for any occasion with fun messages, photos, and loopy GIFs. Customizable, schedulable, and perfect for collaboration ğŸ’› ğŸ‰
nodes.title: Teamo 2.0 - Designed for the group, built for the celebration

nodes.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
nodes.title: Quadrant Eye - Renew your glasses and contact lens RX from your couch
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
nodes.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
nodes.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp

nodes.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.
nodes.title: tw-rl - Curate Twitter. Save and organize tweets or threads
nodes.author: Christopher John

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Straw.Page is an extremely simple website builder, focused on creativity. You can use it to design awesome websites straight from your phone
nodes.title: Straw.Page - Extremely simple website builder

nodes.excerpt: TLDR This is a web app (+ chrome extension) that helps you summarize any piece of text into concise, easy to digest content so you can free yourself from information overload.
nodes.title: TLDR This - Automatically summarize any article or webpage in a click.
nodes.author: Samanyou Garg

nodes.excerpt: Mango Table is three-dimensional project management service. Our service focuses on expressing three-dimensional relationships, such as inclusion relationship, priority, etc, and visualizing projects in progress concurrently. Get more information from our https://mangotable.me.
nodes.title: Mango Table - Visual, hierarchical, relationship-oriented project manager
nodes.author: Changhoi Kim

nodes.excerpt: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typedâ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typedâ now.

nodes.excerpt: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are cutting-edge websites that behave like native apps. They're installable, fast, work offline, and open in their own native window. Pep turns your existing website into a PWA in one line of code.
nodes.title: Pep - Turn your site into a fast, installable Progressive Web App

nodes.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
nodes.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely

nodes.excerpt: BounceHunter is a simple way to clean your email list. If you have a dirty email list, our free analyze tool will tell you that. We utilize hybrid verification, a combination of accept all detection and real-time verification, to provide the most accurate results in the industry.
